title: Notification and gesture bar pixel 5
content:
I've noticed the notification bar at the top is quite large,also that silly little gesture bar at the bottom needs to disappear 😅.
Don't have it on other brands like Samsung,OnePlus etc.
Is there a workaround for this?.
Other than that I'm loving the pixel 5,the simplicity and stock android is 😍
Well done Google 👍
